name: Cinder lands Demo
description:
Reclaim the Cinder lands

After the destruction of her village by an army of sentient robots, Kinyaga the last survivor of her tribe goes on a journey to seek revenge. In this short demo you will explore the remains of what seemed to be the home of mechanical gods and fight against their minions. 

How to play

Download the file, extract the folder and launch the exe file inside it. You can play with both keyboard and controller.

This is my first game so you might find some issues feel free to tell me about them with a comment!

Have fun!
